hero_title:
Batch Rename Files
Inside Your ZIP Archives
hero_subtitle: Stop extracting, renaming, and re-zipping. Upload your archive, define rules, and download the organized result in seconds.
drop_subtitle: or <label for='fileInput' class='text-primary hover:underline cursor-pointer'>browse files</label>
step1_desc: Drag and drop your ZIP archive. We analyze it instantly without extracting files to disk.
step2_desc: Set renaming rules: search & replace, add prefixes, numbering, or cleanup special characters.
step3_desc: Get a new ZIP file with organized contents. Fast, secure, and private.
case1_desc: Renaming thousands of 'IMG_1234.JPG' to 'Vacation_001.jpg' takes seconds.
case2_desc: Standardize client invoices by adding dates or project codes in bulk.
case3_desc: Batch rename assets, icons, or datasets without unzipping large archives.
feature_privacy_desc: Your files are never fully extracted to our disk. We stream-process the ZIP structure, ensuring maximum privacy.
feature_speed_desc: Using streaming technology, we only modify the central directory of the ZIP. GB-sized files process instantly.
faq1_a: Yes, the basic version allows unlimited files during our beta period.
faq2_a: Absolutely. Files are processed in temporary memory and deleted immediately after the session.
faq3_q: Do I need to install anything?
faq3_a: No. ZipRenamer works entirely in your browser. No software installation required.
